ComicInfo.Title: A Mountain from an Anthill
ComicInfo.Summary: A Mountain from an Anthill: The Avengers investigate the disappearance of Hank Pym only to find that he isn't missing at all but is being betrayed by his lab assistant who has a crush on Janet.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:34:42. [Issue ID 930437]
